description:
Whoever is targeting the dancer will strike during the show, but Ryo still doesn`t know what they want.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinjuku Success Monogatari, Otonari-san wa Bijin Dancer (Kouhen)
Shinjuku success legend. The neighbor is a beautiful dancer (Part 2)
新宿サクセス物語 お隣さんは美人ダンサー (後編)
